chapter.title: Compatibility and Supported Systems
chapter.para: Skit has been developed for Unix-like systems, and currently can only be built on such systems.

Although it is designed to be database-agnostic, skit currently only supports the PostgreSQL database system. The following versions of PostgreSQL are supported
By supported we mean that details for every type of object provided by the database will be extracted by the extract command, all differences for such objects will be identified by the diff command, and complete DDL for that object will be generated by the generate command.
